question: Who has been awarded Best Actor award in the Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival Awards 2020?
explanation: The Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival Awards 2020 were announced in Mumbai on February 20, 2020. Hrithik Roshan was awarded the Best Actor award for his film 'Super 30', while the movie directed by Vikas Bahl was selected as the Best Film. Dia Mirza was honored with the Best Actress award for ‘Kaafir’ (web series)
